sentences: Christopher Alan Broderick (born March 6, 1970) is an American musician, best known as the former guitarist of the heavy metal band Megadeth.
Before joining Megadeth and while still in Jag Panzer, he was also a touring guitarist for Nevermore between 2001 and 2003 and then again between 2006 and 2007.
Before joining Megadeth and while still in Jag Panzer, he was also a touring guitarist for Nevermore between 2001 and 2003 and then again between 2006 and 2007.
He was a standout player in the Denver music scene from 1988 on in bands Grey Haven, Industrial Eden (guitarist/lead vocalist) and Killing Time.
Jag Panzer (1997–2008)
In 1997, guitarist Joey Tafolla left Jag Panzer for the second time, citing a lack of interest in playing heavy metal.

After the release of the album, This Godless Endeavor, he began once again to tour with Nevermore until joining Megadeth in 2008.
Megadeth (2008–2014)
In late 2007, rumors had been circulating that Megadeth guitarist Glen Drover had left the band.
He made his live debut with the band on February 4, 2008, in Finland and toured with them on Gigantour 2008.

He went on to record guitar parts for their twelfth album, Endgame (2009), through to their fourteenth album, Super Collider (2013).

On March 8, 2009, Mustaine commented that he thought Broderick was the greatest guitarist Megadeth had ever had.

On November 25, 2014, Broderick posted a message on his website saying he was parting ways with Megadeth: "Due to artistic and musical differences, it is with great reluctance that I announce my departure from Megadeth to pursue my own musical direction.

During the time period of 2000–2003 and some of 2004, Broderick was taking part in the live shows of heavy metal band Nevermore.
He is now the lead guitarist for Act of Defiance, which he formed with fellow ex-Megadeth bandmate Shawn Drover.
Early years =
Broderick started playing guitar when he was 11 years old.
Broderick has been said to have practiced 14 hours a day during his summers as a teen.

After leaving Megadeth, Broderick and former Megadeth drummer Shawn Drover formed Act of Defiance along with ex-Scar the Martyr frontman Henry Derek Bonner and former Shadows Fall guitarist Matt Bachand.
